136.heading: Fred Basset. Spanish.
136.title: "Ayudará Esto?"
136.author: A
notes: Summary: Fred brings a hammer, hoping to help his master start the lawnmower.
In translation from Listín Diario (Dominican Republic), Jan. 23, 2000.

154.title: Fred (Othon Aristides), 1931-
notes: Comics artist and writer born in Greece, who works in French comics, cf. Guide de la Bande Dessinée , par Philippe Bronson. 2. éd (Grenoble : Glénat, 1986), p. 99.
